update t_member set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_phone = #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_sex = #{memberSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_age = #{memberAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_birthday = #{memberBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_renew = #{memberRenew,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from `t_member`
is_valid = 1
and member_name like concat ("%",#{memberName},"%")
and member_type = #{memberType}
select type_id as typeId,type_name as typeName from t_membertype
